title: Manage Contractor Access
description: A third-party contractor needs temporary access to the port to perform work. The admin must issue a temporary pass.

tasks.description: Receive the access request from the contractor, including the names of their workers and the duration of the job.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin receives the list of workers who need access for one week.

tasks.description: Verify that the contracting company has valid insurance on file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin confirms the contractor's insurance is up to date.

tasks.description: Issue temporary access cards for the workers, valid only for the duration of the job.
tasks.expected_outcome: Temporary ID cards with a one-week expiry date are created and issued.
